featurizer = DeepImageFeaturizer(inputCol=input_col, outputCol=output_col,
    modelName=model_name)
lr = LogisticRegression(maxIter=10, regParam=0.05, elasticNetParam=0.3,
    labelCol='label')
p = Pipeline(stages=[featurizer, lr])
p_model = p.fit(df)
return p_model, p_model.transform(df)
